title: RISC-V project
content: I wanted to know if anyone had Risc-v Course in their 5th Sem(Ece). If they had it... how they did their project and from where did they get their project idea

comments.body: I will but we have a deadline to fill the project topic by today
Is it compulsory to do a RISC-V related project?
Yep. The language has to be assembly language for single cycle Risc-v processor

Do a loop unrolling project
On ripes

Hey, I am having RISC-V this semester. To get ideas for the project, first look up on IEEE XPlore (Google for it). Search for research papers. \[This is, if you want to do a *very-good project and that you want to be a highlight in your resume*\]. 

But if you want to do a simple project and *hate* this subject, just do some sorting algorithm in assembly language. That should be it. But explain nicely in class.
Ok I'll check it out thanks for your response
I had it 2 sems back. They gave us a list last year. I ended up doing k means clustering in risc v
Bro do BFS/DFS or some graph implementation. You'll find plenty resources online.
